name: Race FREE
description:
Welcome to the most exciting unlimited racing experience. User friendly and extremely fun race game. 

How to play
- Click on the race button to start.
- accelerate pad to increase speed
- Brake pad to stop
- move left or right to avoid obstacles
- avoid hitting moving cars

Game Features
- High Definition 3D graphics
- Great Sound effects
- Exciting Gameplay
- Unlimited Racing

#gamejamafrica2020

Theme: I want to be free Diversifiers: Endless cycle & It’s everybody’s
Category: #mobile Participants; Ejegbu Janet Ijeoma: UI Designer
Omoesiri Akarenuhon: UX Developer
Tejiri Ikepsu Dandy: Compositor Used Engine: Unity
Country: Nigeria
